articles.author: Stella Kim, Patrick Smith, Courtney Kube, Mosheh Gains, Alexandra Bacallao, Daniel Arkin, Andrea Mitchell, Abigail Williams
articles.title: North Korea to expel U.S. soldier Travis King who crossed border - NBC News
articles.description: North Korea said Wednesday that it will expel Travis King, the American Army private who ran across the border into the isolated country this summer.
articles.content: A statement reported by the state-run news agency KCNA said King had confessed he illegally intruded into North Korean territory because he was disillusioned about inhumane treatment and racial discr… [+3138 chars]

articles.author: Hanna Webster
articles.title: Sleep apnea, explained: What to know about the condition that impacts an estimated 30M American adults - Pittsburgh Post-Gazette
articles.description: The chronic condition occurs when a person’s upper airway collapses during sleep, which leads to a temporary lapse in breathing.
